name: Baldi's Basics Demo.
description: This is the My Baldi's Basics demo, Soon to be a full game for now just a prototype tester, for you to get a little bit of a taste and fun of what may come in the full game. And a new update has come out. A new version. And what happened, with that new version in the school house. Well The schoolhouse crashed down in a severe fierce storm, and most of the school house tumbled down. And so they had to rebuild it while rebuilding they decided, to make an outside.
